BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
             Date: 07.12.2009 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.  17 / 2009 
 
 
SUBJECT : RENEWAL OF AIRPORT ENTRY PASSES(AEP) EXPIRING ON 
31.12.2009 
 
Validity of the existing computerized Airport Entry Passes (AEPs), which 
are expiring on 31.12.2009, will be extended by 03 months. Now, these AEPs 
shall remain valid upto 31st March, 2010. 
 
 
This has the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 
 
 
(M.Malaviya) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution: As per the  list attached.
